name: Bloomerang
description:
The garden is swarming with angry bees! Luckily, you've got your trusty "Bloomerang" to help ward them off. Be careful though, you only get one shot to take enemies out. If you miss, the Bloomerang won't come back, and you may be finished!

Use the WASD keys to move, and your mouse to aim and shoot.

Made in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam (2019). The theme of the jam was "Only One".

Art and Music by Seelocanth (http://twitter.com/seelocanth)

Code by Joe Binns (https://.joebinns.com/)
